name: Intruder (itch) (Eva Abollivier)
description:
You are not welcome here.

You find yourself inside a small cell. What are you doing here?
But more importantly, how are you going to get out?

A reinterpretation of the classic metroidvania genre with an RPG twist.

Controls

  • Move - Arrow keys
  • Interact and validate - SPACE or ENTER

Credits

Made by Eva Abollivier

Musics from https://filmmusic.io:
"Killers" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
"Special Spotlight" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
"Raving Energy" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
"Hiding Your Reality" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
"Phantom from Space" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

This game was made in one month for the Metroidvania Month 6 Game Jam.
